abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32518102, pmid32518132, pmid32522874, pmid32519963, pmid32524732, pmid32519406, pmid32522295, pmid32519064, pmid32524195, pmid32524707, pmid32518134, pmid32524835, pmid32524646, pmid32520599, pmid32525216, pmid32525251, pmid32522870, pmid32524786, pmid32524785, pmid32524333, pmid32519281, pmid32525249, pmid32519768, pmid32522226, pmid32522820, pmid32522822, pmid32522783, pmid32524893, pmid32524618, pmid32524708, pmid32524630, pmid32522282, pmid32518987, pmid32520302
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.15
